snippet: The group released a video showing the beheading of a second American, blaming President Obama for the death and raising the pressure on him to order strikes on the group in Syria.
abstract: Video released by Islamic State in Iraq and Syria shows beheading of freelance journalist Steven J Sotloff, second American hostage to be slain in two weeks; militants put blame for his brutal murder on Pres Obama; killing raises pressure on president to order strike on group's sanctuary in Syria; video has not yet been authenticated, but most sources believe he is dead.

byline.original: By MARK LANDLER and ERIC SCHMITT
byline.contributor: Rukmini Callimachi contributed reporting from Brussels, Rick Gladstone from New York, and Julie Hirschfeld Davis from Tallinn, Estonia.

lead_paragraph: The group released a video showing the beheading of a second American, blaming President Obama for the death and raising the pressure on him to order strikes on the group in Syria.

headline.main: ISIS Says It Killed Steven Sotloff After U.S. Strikes in Northern Iraq
headline.print_headline: ISIS Says It Killed Second American Journalist After U.S. Strikes in Northern Iraq

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
